results.content:
Very good course I am extremely glad that I took this course. It is nice to have a course that is direct and to the point with a project that can be used in the real world. 

This is a fast paced course (suits my learning style best) and I could tell the instructor is very knowledgeable in this field!

5 stars from me - I would recommend this course to anyone wanting to up their PHP form skills!

results.content:
It is a crash course - very fast paced, you will get required functionality in 30 min. Then you can expand on that knowledge and build other forms.

Bear in mind that it's not a "complete beginner" course - you need to know some basics already: how to connect to the database, understand a bit of jQuery, php, etc (although you can just follow the instructor and figure it out yourself - not very difficult)

I like that this course was quick and to the point - no time wasted!
Well done Zeeshan!

response.content: Thank you DT and yes, I prefer to create fast-faced course to the point to help my students reach to their destination without wasting time in unnecessary stuff. I'm glad that it helped you :)
response.content_html: Thank you DT and yes, I prefer to create fast-faced course to the point to help my students reach to their destination without wasting time in unnecessary stuff. I'm glad that it helped you :)
